text:
@WhiteHouse Is that why he is rushing to reopen the country asap, ignoring his Coronavirus task force, because he likes mourning? The numbers are rising . New estimates=100,000 deaths by summer. We need not be abandoned we need to... 
#VoteBidenToSave America
